DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Addition Osmotic Dilators Preparation Prior Labor Induction Abortion
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study uncontrolled , non-randomized series . Women medical abortion second trimester undergo several procedure day medication cause contraction occur . On day admission , take mifepristone orally , feticidal injection . would add insertion cervical osmotic dilator ( intervention ) . On day induction , dilator would remove misoprostol start cause contraction . We hop median abortion time drop present 9-10 hour 4-6 hour . woman abort 6 hour option surgical completion abortion ( dilation evacuation ) medically appropriate .
